title: Policy Verifier Microservice Configuration
description: Defines settings for the dedicated service responsible for verifying external cryptographic proofs linked to GRS configuration policies.

verifierID.description: Unique identifier for the Policy Verifier instance.

maxVerificationTimeoutMs.description: Maximum time to wait for a cryptographic proof verification before failing the configuration application.

proofEndpoints.description: Trusted external endpoints (e.g., decentralized ledger URLs or dedicated ZKP solvers) for retrieving policy proofs.

trustAnchorCertPath.description: Local path to the root certificate used to establish trust with external proof services.
